Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for overnight updates or critical alerts. Respond to any urgent emails from supervisors or colleagues.
Brief team huddle with @rn-2, @pchmp-1, and @qatest-1 to discuss the day's patient assignments and potential challenges. Share any observations or concerns from the previous day.
Focus on completing patient assessments, emphasizing accurate data entry into the EHR. Pay special attention to medication reconciliation and allergy verification.

Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients in the morning clinic. Provide clear and concise instructions regarding potential side effects and post-vaccination care. Document vaccine details meticulously.
Lunch Break - Check out the local food trucks with @da-1 and @his-1; discuss favorite recipes and new restaurants in town.

Continue patient assessments and data entry into the EHR. Focus on patients with complex medical histories or multiple comorbidities. Collaborate with physicians and other healthcare providers as needed.
Email @trainer-1 to request access to the latest EHR training materials for refresher purposes. @trainer-1 topic: EHR training materials
Administer influenza vaccinations during the afternoon clinic, ensuring efficient workflow and patient comfort. Address any patient concerns or questions regarding the vaccine.
Review patient charts for completeness and accuracy. Address any discrepancies or missing information. Prepare for handover to the next shift.
Respond to emails, complete any outstanding tasks, and prepare for tomorrow's shift.
